name: Notion - Simple Second Brain
description: Second Brain is one of the most comprehensive digital planning tool on the market, and this template is the easiest-to-use second brain template you can find. It's the best for you who just want to start your digital system.This template is made simple because I want it to be highly customizable to your needs.What you'll get: Fully support both light and dark mode design Built on the popular P.A.R.A. organization method introduced by productivity expert, Tiago Forte. Highly Customizable Include
features: Fully support both light and dark mode design; Built on the popular P.A.R.A. organization method introduced by productivity expert, Tiago Forte.; Highly Customizable; Include a guide
